version_description:
- Bukoli added( thanks Tarık)

- China Post fixed
- Welcome and Map screens are re-designed (Thanks Robert) Please note that Map screen tries to pin the locations according to information shared by courier. Due to lack of information it may pinpoint wrong locations. If you notice any problem with correct location data, please let me know.

- Edit option is added. You can easily edit your parcel by swiping left on the main list. (thanks Tanay)
- GLS Italy added
- Nacex added
- Seur International added
- Faspeed added (thanks Mersin)
- French, German, Italian, Russian and Spanish translations are added.
- Other small enhancements

- Mrw added

- Aras Kargo small issue fixed (thanks Kemal, Uğur and Özgür)
- Enhancements to edit screen (thanks İsmail)
- TNT refresh problem fixed( thanks Fatih)
- Dutch,Portuguese and Poland translations are added.
- Other small enhancements

- You can add a tracking number before the item is actually shipped.

This version is completely redesigned and polished. It is more feature packed than ever.

- App now supports more than 300 couriers.
- Tracking happens via servers. No more updating the app if couriers change their tracking page.
- Sync your parcels across your devices.
- Premium users can track their parcels from portal.findmyparcels.com with their computers. This is a free service for all premium users.
- Better notifications. Notifications are now more reliable and richer.
- Siri Shortcuts
- WatchOS app redesigned. It can get latest details by its own.
- Two new dark themes. Come to the dark side, we have cookies.
- Different App icons.
- Redesigned Barcode reader
- Force touch added to main Parcel List
- Small additions and fixes to other parts of the app.

Starting from version 2, premium version will require a subscription. Old premium users will automatically get Lifetime subscription. I really appreciate the support you gave and I hope you continue to do so.

Since this version has so many breaking changes, it is possible to contain some bugs. Please report all the bugs to support@findmyparcels.com and let me fix.

- Small bug fixes
- Italian translation fixes (Thanks Stefan)

This version is completely redesigned and polished. It is more feature packed than ever.
- App now supports more than 300 couriers.
- Tracking happens via servers. No more updating the app if couriers change their tracking page.
- Sync your parcels across your devices.
- Premium users can track their parcels from portal.findmyparcels.com with their computers. This is a free service for all premium users.
- Better notifications. Notifications are now more reliable and richer.
- Siri Shortcuts
- WatchOS app redesigned. It can get latest details by its own.
- Two new dark themes. Come to the dark side, we have cookies.
- Different App icons.
- Redesigned Barcode reader
- Force touch added to main Parcel List
- Small additions and fixes to other parts of the app.

Starting from version 2, premium version will require a subscription. Old premium users will automatically get Lifetime subscription. I really appreciate the support you gave and I hope you continue to do so.

Since this version has so many breaking changes, it is possible to contain some bugs. Please report all the bugs to support@findmyparcels.com and let me fix

- Password change bug fixed.
- Barcode reader now correctly sets detected couriers
- First letter of parcel's name is now capitalized.

- Couriers updated
- Bug fixes

- Translation fixes
- Better courier detection
- Subscribed users can now have 50 Delivered and 50 Active parcels. Totally you can have 100 parcels in your account.

- Editing parcels fixed
- Wrong phone numbers fixed
- Turkish couriers removed for users without current subscription

I am sorry for the Turkish couriers but I am tired of being harassed by Turkish people almost every day by email and App Store reviews. I am being called different names such as incompetent, greedy(I just make a $30 per month) and lots of f words. It just doesn't worth it anymore. I am really tired of these people. I am tired of fighting against them. Anyway sorry for the long rant.
- WatchOS sorting bug fixed

- Free users now track 3 parcels
- Turkish Couriers are back
- Bug related to ads showing up to registered users, fixed. I am sorry

- iOS 13 improvements
- Text size is increased for main list
- Analytics framework is removed. App size is also decreased because of this.
- Amazon tracking is fixed. In order to track your Amazon packages, you must paste the tracking link from the email Amazon sent you.
- HepsiJET added.
- iOS 13 bug related to purchased fixed. Thanks sefasimsek
- Small bug in settings fixed. Thanks Yilmaz

- Multiple parcels can be deleted at the same time.
- More granular control over notifications. For example, you can choose to get only delivery notifications.
- Improvements for VoiceOver users.
- Theme fixes.
- Other bug fixes and improvements.
